title: Isaac del Toro Picks Up Time Bonus and Shows No Signs of Easing Grip on Pink Jersey at Giro d’Italia
content:
Isaac del Toro is showing a mix of composure, exuberance that could see him keep the pink jersey at the Giro d'Italia into the decisive final week: 'We'll see what the future holds.'
